org.openscience.cdk

Class AtomContainerSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.ChemObject
      • org.openscience.cdk.AtomContainerSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, IAtomContainerSet, ICDKObject, IChemObject, IChemObjectListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DebugAtomContainerSet, MoleculeSet, NNAtomContainerSet, RingSet

    public class AtomContainerSet
extends ChemObject
implements Serializable, IAtomContainerSet, IChemObjectListener, Cloneable
    A set of AtomContainers.
    Author:
    hel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Belongs to CDK module:
